[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”BENEFITS” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%239d1e3c” google_fonts=”font_family:Abel%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Industry Innovation Partners (Associate Membership)

This membership category is created for organizations that are specifically focused on driving innovation or initiatives to support innovation. These organizations could be subsidiaries of larger corporates or independent entities, whose core business would not be software development or IT services. However, these organizations already use or see the potential of AR/VR, AI, IoT, robotics and other emerging technologies to empower their business. As such, there are considerable synergies to be obtained by partnering and engaging with SLASSCOM events and working with SLASSCOM member companies.

  • Industry Innovation Partners would be an Associate Membership and the Annual Subscription is USD 575 (~LKR 90,000). There is no joining fee and no references are required for membership.
  • The following benefits would be available to Industry Innovation Partners.
  • Attend monthly networking/learning events, with a community of industry leaders, including potential business partners, investors and CEOs
  • Opportunities for your company representatives to participate and discuss current industry topics at regular SLASSCOM forum meetings
  • Opportunity to participate in learning and development events, conducted by industry experts at subsidized rates (savings to the value of LKR 3,000 – 5,000 per participant per event), unlimited registration and participation throughout the year for all events. Please visit https://slasscom.eventbank.com/org/slasscom/ for current and past events.
  • Join training programs, Tech Talks and workshops organized by member companies and partners (over 30 programs annually)
  • Opportunity for your product/services and knowledge sharing sessions to be promoted among member companies
  • Access to key industry data, policy changes and research updates (e.g. SLASSCOM Annual Compensation and Benefits Survey)
  • Avail yourself to new business opportunities and offers, at subsidized rates, from SLASSCOM members and industry partners.

 

To become a member, please register at https://slasscom.lk/join-now or contact  corpoffice@slasscom.lk  for more information.

 

 

Captive Centres of Multinationals (IT/BPO)

Join SLASSCOM and obtain the following benefits to grow your business and equip your employees. As a member, you also obtain the opportunity to collaborate on macro issues such as branding and capacity, and also influence policy issues impacting the industry, through multiple SLASSCOM forums and events.

Some of your membership benefits include:

  • Attend quarterly networking events with a community of industry leaders including potential business partners, investors and CEOs
  • Opportunities for your Technology, Quality Assurance, Human Resource and Finance teams to participate and discuss current industry topics, addressing their specific interests and needs at monthly SLASSCOM forums
  • Opportunity to participate in learning and development events conducted by industry experts at subsidized rates (savings to the value of LKR 3,000 – 5,000 per participant per event), unlimited registration and participation throughout the year for all events
  • Join free training programs, Tech Talks and workshops organized by member companies and partners (over 30 programs annually)
  • Opportunity for your product/services and knowledge sharing sessions to be promoted among member companies
  • Access to key industry data, policy changes and research updates (e.g. SLASSCOM Annual Compensation and Benefits Survey, Impact on Tax Amendments to the IT/BPM Industry, Industry Skills Need Analysis Report)
  • Avail yourself to new business opportunities and offers at subsidized rates from SLASSCOM members and industry partners
  • Have your contact listed as a member on the SLASSCOM website for direct leads
  • Be eligible to publish the “Member of SLASSCOM” badge on your website

 

To become a member, please register at https://slasscom.lk/join-now or contact  corpoffice@slasscom.lk  for more information.

Industry Enablers, Infrastructure Providers and Institutions

Join SLASSCOM and obtain the following benefits as an industry enabler, infrastructure or services provider. You will be kept informed of current industry developments, participate at SLASSCOM forums and also promote your products and services.

Some of your membership benefits include:

  • Attend monthly networking events with a community of industry leaders including potential business partners, investors and CEOs
  • Opportunities for your company representatives to participate and discuss current industry topics at monthly SLASSCOM forums
  • Opportunity to participate in learning and development events conducted by industry experts at subsidized rates (savings to the value of LKR 3,000 – 5,000 per participant per event), unlimited registration and participation throughout the year for all events

Join SLASSCOM and obtain the following benefits to grow your business and equip your employees.

  • Receive opportunities to participate in international trade missions at subsidized rates to promote your product/service
  • Be eligible to participate at international pitching events such as Seedstars World, Oslo Innovation Week, Norway and SLUSH Helsinki, Finland

Start-up Companies

Join SLASSCOM and obtain the following benefits to grow your start-up. Be part of an active Entrepreneurship Forum with regular opportunities to interact with other founders and mentors.

Some of your membership benefits include:

  • Attend monthly networking sessions with an encouraging entrepreneurial community such as potential business partners, investors, CEOs and industry leaders
  • Opportunity to participate in learning and development events conducted by industry experts at subsidized rates (savings to the value of LKR 3,000 – 5,000 per participant per event), unlimited registration and participation throughout the year for all events
  • Join free training programs, Tech Talks and workshops organized by member companies and partners (over 30 programs annually)
  • Opportunity for your product/service to be promoted among member companies
  • Opportunity to participate in monthly mentoring sessions conducted by credible industry leaders with a proven entrepreneurial track record
  • Access to key industry data, policy changes and research updates
